hero.headline: Expert Plumbing Services You Can Trust
hero.subheadline: 24/7 Emergency Service • Licensed & Insured • Free Estimates

about.title: About Us
about.text: With over 20 years of experience serving the community, Example Plumbing Co. has built a reputation for quality work and honest service. Our licensed technicians are available around the clock for all your plumbing needs.

services.name: Emergency Repairs
services.description: Fast response for burst pipes, major leaks, and flooding. Available 24/7.

services.name: Drain Cleaning
services.description: Professional drain cleaning to clear clogs and prevent backups.

services.name: Water Heater Service
services.description: Installation, repair, and maintenance for all water heater types.

services.name: Bathroom Remodeling
services.description: Complete bathroom plumbing for renovations and new construction.

testimonials.name: John D.
testimonials.content: They came out within an hour when our basement flooded. Professional, fast, and fair pricing. Highly recommend!

testimonials.name: Sarah M.
testimonials.content: Best plumber we've ever used. They fixed a leak that two other companies couldn't figure out.

testimonials.name: Mike R.
testimonials.content: On time, clean work, and they explained everything before starting. Will definitely use again.
